prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Manuscript Fragment from a Joaquin Miller Poem, Accession # 7132-l, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This holding was purchased from Charles Agvent of Mertztown, Pennsylvania on May 4, 1998.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This is an unidentified fragment of a poem, completely in the hand of Joaquin Miller, with a few pencil corrections.
